Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [Take off, rise, and go left over the flat roof. Fly straight to the building with a lady on a billboard, then veer right and continue straight. Head to the yellow billboard, make a half right turn, and fly over the fountain towards the trees. Fly over the treetops, veer right towards the road between buildings, then take a near full left turn over trees until you see water. Rise near a tree, turn right until you see four buildings, then go straight to the car banner. Fly between the banner and building, continue straight, veer left of the high-rise, then a bit right. Descend to see a 5-story building, turn left, rise above it, and make a half left turn. Fly right of the car banner building to see the skyline, then turn left slightly and fly high over the trees.]. At the initial position, you are asked to move according to a series of movement instructions. In terms of next steps, what is your best next step?  
choose:  
A. I go up and turn left.  
B. I descend and fly forward.  
C. I fly forward while rising.  
D. I turn right and descend.  
E. I rotate the camera downward.
